LandingPage.schemaDescription: Street2Ivy — Where emerging talent meets real-world work. Students gain verified corporate experience. Companies find proven talent.
LandingPage.title: Street2Ivy — Where Emerging Talent Meets Real-World Work
LandingPage.description: Street2Ivy connects ambitious students with real corporate projects. Students build verified experience. Companies find proven talent. Universities boost outcomes.
LandingPage.heroTitle: Real Projects. Real Companies. Real Reputation.
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: AI is automating the work that once trained the next generation. Street2Ivy connects ambitious students with corporate project teams — giving talent real experience and giving companies a low-risk pipeline to proven talent from any campus.
LandingPage.whySubtitle: A talent marketplace built on mutual value. Everyone wins when potential meets opportunity.
LandingPage.feature1Description: Go beyond the classroom. Build a portfolio of real corporate projects that proves you can do the work AI can't replace.
LandingPage.feature2Description: Access motivated, pre-vetted students for scoped projects. No headcount commitment, no intern program overhead — just results.
LandingPage.feature3Description: Boost graduate placement rates and career readiness without building new infrastructure. Plug your students into real opportunities.
LandingPage.howSubtitle: Street2Ivy handles the match. You handle the work.
LandingPage.howCompanyStep1Desc: Describe the work, set the timeline, choose the skills you need. No materials to upload — just the opportunity.
LandingPage.howCompanyStep2Desc: Browse rated, verified student profiles. See their skills, completed projects, and reviews from other companies.
LandingPage.howCompanyStep3Desc: Choose the right match. We'll facilitate a professional introduction.
LandingPage.howCompanyStep4Desc: Use your own tools — Slack, email, Google Drive, whatever your team already uses. We stay out of your workflow.
LandingPage.howCompanyStep5Desc: Rate the student's work. Your review helps build the next generation's professional reputation.
LandingPage.howStudentStep1Desc: Showcase your skills, major, experience, and what you're looking for. Your profile is your professional storefront.
LandingPage.howStudentStep2Desc: Search real projects by industry, company, skills, and work mode. Apply to the ones that excite you.
LandingPage.howStudentStep3Desc: When a company chooses you, we make the introduction. You'll connect directly with their team.
LandingPage.howStudentStep4Desc: Complete the project using the company's tools and processes. This is real corporate experience, not a simulation.
LandingPage.howStudentStep5Desc: Earn verified reviews that follow you. Every completed project makes you more attractive to future employers.
LandingPage.howUniStep1Desc: Get a branded career marketplace for your students — powered by Street2Ivy, branded for your institution.
LandingPage.howUniStep2Desc: Bring your alumni network and corporate partners onto the platform to post real opportunities.
LandingPage.howUniStep3Desc: See which students are gaining experience, their ratings, completion rates, and placement metrics — all in your admin dashboard.
LandingPage.howUniStep4Desc: Add 24/7 AI-powered career coaching for your students — interview prep, resume feedback, and career path guidance.
LandingPage.trustNoDataDesc: Project materials, code, documents, and deliverables never touch our platform. Your IP stays in your systems.
LandingPage.trustNoLegalDesc: No platform terms to review for project materials, no data processing agreements. We handle the match, you handle the work.
LandingPage.trustYourToolsDesc: Students work in your Slack, your Google Drive, your GitHub. Same tools your team already uses.
LandingPage.trustVerifiedDesc: Every student comes with ratings from real companies. See how they actually perform, not just what they claim.
LandingPage.trustTryDesc: Scoped projects let you evaluate talent in action — no headcount commitment, no internship program overhead.
LandingPage.valueStudentsHeading: Build a Career Portfolio That Speaks for Itself
LandingPage.valueStudentsP1: Real projects from real companies — not classroom simulations
LandingPage.valueStudentsP2: Verified reviews that future employers trust
LandingPage.valueStudentsP3: Work from anywhere — your skills are your credential, not your zip code or network
LandingPage.valueStudentsP4: As AI reshapes entry-level work, complex project experience is what sets you apart
LandingPage.valueCompaniesHeading: A Smarter Way to Find Emerging Talent
LandingPage.valueCompaniesP1: Access motivated, pre-vetted students for scoped projects
LandingPage.valueCompaniesP2: No intern program overhead — post a project, select a student, get results
LandingPage.valueCompaniesP3: See real ratings and work history — not just résumés
LandingPage.valueCompaniesP4: Build a pipeline of proven talent you can hire with confidence
LandingPage.valueUnisHeading: Plug Your Students Into Real Opportunities
LandingPage.valueUnisP1: Boost graduate placement rates and career readiness metrics
LandingPage.valueUnisP2: White-label the platform with your institution's brand
LandingPage.valueUnisP3: Engage alumni as project sponsors and mentors
LandingPage.valueUnisP4: Add AI career coaching to extend your career services capacity
LandingPage.testimonialsSubtitle: Real results from real people on both sides of the marketplace.
LandingPage.ctaCompaniesDesc: Find motivated, pre-vetted student talent for your next project.
LandingPage.ctaStudentsDesc: Build your career portfolio with real corporate projects.
LandingPage.ctaUnisDesc: Boost outcomes with a branded career marketplace for your campus.
LandingPage.ctaDescription: Join thousands of students and companies already connecting on Street2Ivy.
LandingPage.aiCoachingDesc: Street2Ivy students at participating institutions get access to personalized AI career coaching — interview preparation, resume feedback, skill development, and career path guidance. Always available, always personalized, always in your corner.
LandingPage.home.student.subtitle: Here's your career dashboard
LandingPage.home.student.action.updatePr: Complete your profile to stand out
LandingPage.home.student.section.complet: Complete your profile to increase visibility to employers
LandingPage.home.student.section.getStar: Complete your profile and browse projects to begin your career journey
LandingPage.home.student.coaching.title: {name} is Ready
LandingPage.home.student.coaching.descri: Get personalized help with resumes, interview prep, career strategy, and more — available 24/7.
LandingPage.home.student.coaching.locked: AI-powered career coaching will be available when your institution enables this feature. Contact your career services office for more information.
LandingPage.home.corporate.subtitle: Your talent pipeline at a glance
LandingPage.home.corporate.section.getSt: Post your first project to start connecting with qualified student talent
LandingPage.home.alumni.subtitle: Your alumni network hub
LandingPage.home.alumni.section.getStart: Create a mentorship project to start giving back to your alma mater
LandingPage.home.eduAdmin.subtitle: {institutionName} Dashboard
LandingPage.home.eduAdmin.action.message: Send messages to students and admins
LandingPage.home.eduAdmin.section.getSta: View your students' progress and manage your institution's presence
LandingPage.home.sysAdmin.subtitle: Platform Overview
LandingPage.home.sysAdmin.action.message: Send messages to educators and students

ListingPage.howItWorks.heading: How It Works
ListingPage.howItWorks.step1.title: Apply through Street2Ivy
ListingPage.howItWorks.step1.description: Submit your application and let the project sponsor know you're interested.
ListingPage.howItWorks.step2.title: Get selected and introduced
ListingPage.howItWorks.step2.description: If selected, you'll be connected directly with the project sponsor to kick things off.
ListingPage.howItWorks.step3.title: Work on the project
ListingPage.howItWorks.step3.description: All project work, communication, and materials happen through the sponsor's own tools and systems.
ListingPage.howItWorks.step4.title: Build your reputation
ListingPage.howItWorks.step4.description: When the project wraps up, both you and the sponsor exchange reviews to build verified track records.

UserCard.heading: Hello, I'm {name}.
EducationDashboardPage.title: Career Services Dashboard | Street2Ivy
EducationDashboardPage.heading: Career Services Dashboard
EducationDashboardPage.noAccessMessage: This dashboard is only available to verified career services administrators. If you're from a university career services office, please apply to become a partner.
EducationDashboardPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, major, or university...
EducationDashboardPage.fetchError: Unable to load dashboard data. Please refresh to try again.
EducationDashboardPage.noStudents: No students from your institution have registered yet. Share Street2Ivy with your students to get started!
EducationDashboardPage.noResults: No students match your search criteria.
EducationDashboardPage.noTransactions: This student hasn't applied to any projects yet.
EducationDashboardPage.reportsDescriptio: Download detailed reports about your institution's student engagement and outcomes.
EducationDashboardPage.studentActivityDe: Detailed breakdown of each student's applications, acceptances, and project completions.
EducationDashboardPage.engagementDescrip: Visualize how your students progress through the platform from registration to project completion.
EducationDashboardPage.companySpendingDe: Overview of how much corporate partners have invested in student projects.
EducationDashboardPage.messageError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
EducationDashboardPage.subscriptionNote: Contact Street2Ivy support to complete your institution's setup and enable AI coaching for your students.
EducationDashboardPage.noAlumni: No alumni invited yet. Use the form above to send invitations.
EducationDashboardPage.noPortal: No portal has been set up for your institution yet.
EducationDashboardPage.requestAccessDesc: Submit a request to set up your institution's branded portal on Street2Ivy.
EducationDashboardPage.requestReason: Why do you want a branded portal?
EducationDashboardPage.requestSubmitted: Your request has been submitted! We'll review it and get back to you soon.
EducationDashboardPage.confirmDeleteAlum: Are you sure you want to remove this alumni?
EducationDashboardPage.helpOverview: This overview shows real-time engagement metrics for your institution's students. Click any stat card to jump to the related detailed view.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStatStudents: Total number of students from your institution who have created Street2Ivy accounts. 'Active' means they've logged in within the last 30 days.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStatApplicati: Number of project applications submitted by your students. 'Pending' applications are still awaiting a response from the company.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStatPlacement: Students who have been accepted to work on a corporate project. The acceptance rate is calculated as placements divided by total applications.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStatDeclined: Applications that were not selected by the corporate partner. This is normal — encourage students to apply to multiple projects.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStatCompleted: Projects that students have successfully finished. The completion rate measures how many placed students complete their projects.
EducationDashboardPage.helpEngagementMet: Secondary engagement indicators showing the breadth of your students' activity across the platform.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStudents: Browse and search all registered students from your institution. Click a student's name to view their full profile, or click 'View Activity' to see their project applications and outcomes.
EducationDashboardPage.helpStudentsSearc: Search by student name, major, or any keyword. Click on a major in the table to quick-filter by that major.
EducationDashboardPage.helpAlumni: Invite alumni from your institution to mentor students, post projects, or connect with the community. Alumni receive an email invitation with a unique registration link.
EducationDashboardPage.helpAlumniInvite: Fill in the alumni's details and click 'Send Invitation'. They'll receive an email with a unique link to join Street2Ivy as a verified alumni of your institution.
EducationDashboardPage.helpAlumniStatus: Invitation status: 'invited' means the email was sent but not yet accepted. 'accepted' means the alumni has created their account.
EducationDashboardPage.helpReports: Download detailed CSV reports about your institution's student engagement and outcomes. Reports can be imported into Excel, Google Sheets, or any analytics tool.
EducationDashboardPage.helpReportsSummar: A high-level snapshot of your institution's key metrics including enrollment, applications, placements, and completion rates.
EducationDashboardPage.helpReportsActivi: Per-student breakdown of all project activity including applications, acceptances, declines, and completions. Ideal for advising meetings.
EducationDashboardPage.helpReportsEngage: Visualizes your student engagement funnel — from registration through application, placement, and project completion.
EducationDashboardPage.helpReportsCompan: Shows how much corporate partners have invested in student projects at your institution.
EducationDashboardPage.helpBranding: Customize how your institution's portal appears to students and alumni. Changes are reflected immediately across the platform.
EducationDashboardPage.helpPortalName: The name displayed in the header and emails for your institution's branded portal. Example: 'Harvard x Street2Ivy'.
EducationDashboardPage.helpBrandColor: Your institution's primary brand color. Used for headers, buttons, and accents throughout your branded portal experience.
EducationDashboardPage.helpLogoUrl: URL to your institution's logo. Use a square image (at least 200x200px) for best results. Displayed in the portal header and email templates.
EducationDashboardPage.helpFeatureToggle: Enable or disable optional features for your institution's portal. Changes take effect immediately for all your students.
EducationDashboardPage.helpFeatureAiCoac: AI-powered coaching provides personalized project recommendations and application tips for your students.
EducationDashboardPage.helpFeatureAssess: Student assessments allow you to evaluate student readiness before they apply to corporate projects.
EducationDashboardPage.helpMessages: Send messages to individual students or broadcast announcements to all students at your institution. Messages appear in students' notification feeds.
EducationDashboardPage.emptyStudentsDesc: Students from your institution will appear here once they create Street2Ivy accounts. Share the platform link with your students to get started!
EducationDashboardPage.emptyAlumniDescri: Build your alumni network by sending invitations. Alumni can mentor students, post projects, and strengthen your institution's presence on Street2Ivy.
EducationDashboardPage.emptyReportsDescr: Reports will populate once students begin applying to projects. Encourage your students to explore available opportunities!
EducationDashboardPage.emptyMessagesDesc: Use the messaging feature to send announcements, share opportunities, or check in with individual students.
EducationDashboardPage.emptyBrandingDesc: No portal has been configured for your institution yet. Submit a request to get your branded portal set up.
AlumniDashboardPage.title: Alumni Dashboard | Street2Ivy
AlumniDashboardPage.noProjects: You haven't created any projects yet. Share your expertise by creating a project for students!
AlumniDashboardPage.loadError: Error loading dashboard data. Please try again.
AlumniDashboardPage.accessDenied: Access denied. Only alumni users can access this dashboard.
AlumniDashboardPage.helpOverview: Your alumni dashboard shows your project activity and engagement with students. Use the tabs to manage projects, messages, and your profile.
AlumniDashboardPage.helpProjectsCreated: Total number of mentorship projects you've created for students to apply to.
AlumniDashboardPage.helpActiveProjects: Projects that currently have active students working on them.
AlumniDashboardPage.helpTotalApplication: Total number of student applications received across all your projects.
AlumniDashboardPage.emptyActivityDescrip: Once you create projects and receive student applications, your recent activity will appear here.
AlumniDashboardPage.emptyProjectsDescrip: Share your expertise by creating a project for students. Projects let you mentor the next generation and give back to your alma mater.
AlumniDashboardPage.emptyMessagesDescrip: Messages from students and institution administrators will appear here. You'll be notified when someone reaches out.
AlumniDashboardPage.referralLinkDescript: Share this link with students to invite them to join Street2Ivy. When they sign up using your link, they'll be tracked as your referral.
AlumniDashboardPage.emptyReferralsDescri: Share your referral link with students to start tracking referrals. Help grow your institution's talent network!
AlumniJoinPage.title: Join as Alumni | Street2Ivy
AlumniJoinPage.subtitle: You've been invited to join {institutionDomain} as an alumni mentor.
AlumniJoinPage.invalidInvitationMessage: This invitation link is invalid or has already been used. Please contact your institution for a new invitation.
AlumniJoinPage.alreadyAccepted: This invitation has already been accepted.
AlumniJoinPage.successMessage: Your account has been created successfully. You'll be redirected to your dashboard.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.title: Partner With Street2Ivy | For Universities
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.pageSubt: Empower your students with real-world project experience. Join our network of universities connecting students with corporate partners.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit1: Monitor your students' project applications, acceptances, and completions in real-time from your dashboard.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit2: See which students are actively engaged and identify opportunities to provide career guidance.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit3: Generate reports on student engagement and project completion rates for your institution.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit4: Send announcements and messages directly to your students through the platform.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.emailHin: Please use your official university email address
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.reason: How do you plan to use Street2Ivy to help your students?
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.successM: Thank you for your interest in partnering with Street2Ivy. We've received your application and will review it shortly.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.successD: You'll receive a confirmation email within 2-3 business days with next steps.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.question: Questions?
Contact our partnerships team at {email}
AdminDashboardPage.title: Admin Dashboard | Street2Ivy
AdminDashboardPage.heading: System Administration
AdminDashboardPage.subtitle: Manage users, communications, and platform reports
AdminDashboardPage.noAccessMessage: This dashboard is only available to system administrators.
AdminDashboardPage.messageError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
AdminDashboardPage.createAdminDescriptio: Create new administrator accounts for educational institutions or platform management. Admin accounts can only be created here - there is no public admin signup.
AdminDashboardPage.createAdminSuccess: Administrator account created successfully! They can now log in via the admin portal.
AdminDashboardPage.createAdminError: Failed to create administrator account. Please try again.
AdminDashboardPage.passwordHint: The user should change this password after first login.
AdminDashboardPage.confirmDeleteTenant: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant?
AdminDashboardPage.helpTenants: Manage all institution tenants on the platform. Each tenant represents a university or educational institution with their own branded portal, students, and settings.
AdminDashboardPage.helpUsers: View and manage all platform users. You can search, filter by user type, block/unblock accounts, and view user details.
AdminDashboardPage.helpInstitutions: Manage the list of approved educational institutions. Institutions must be added here before their domain can be used for student or admin registration.
AdminDashboardPage.emptyTenantsDescripti: No institution tenants have been created yet. Create your first tenant to allow an institution to use their branded portal.
AdminDashboardPage.emptyInstitutionsDesc: Add your first institution to allow students to sign up and connect with corporate partners.
AdminDashboardPage.emptyApplicationsDesc: No educational administrator applications match the current filter. Try adjusting your filter or check back later.

ApplicationsPage.heading: Student Applications
ApplicationsPage.noApplicationsMessage: You haven't received any student applications yet. Create projects and invite students to apply!

SearchCompaniesPage.searchError: Unable to search companies. Please try again.

OnboardingPage.title: Get Started | Street2Ivy
OnboardingPage.welcome.student: Let's get you set up to find your perfect project and launch your career.
OnboardingPage.welcome.corporatePartner: Let's get you set up to find talented students for your projects.
OnboardingPage.welcome.educationalAdmin: Let's get you set up to monitor your institution's student progress.
OnboardingPage.welcome.default: Let's complete your setup to get started.
OnboardingPage.complete.title: 🎉 You're all set!
OnboardingPage.complete.description: You've completed all the onboarding steps. You're ready to make the most of Street2Ivy!
OnboardingPage.step.verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
OnboardingPage.step.verifyEmail.descript: Check your inbox and click the verification link we sent you.
OnboardingPage.step.completeProfile.desc: Add your bio and key information to help others get to know you.
OnboardingPage.step.addPhoto.title: Add a profile photo
OnboardingPage.step.addPhoto.description: Upload a professional photo to make a great first impression.
OnboardingPage.step.browseProjects.title: Browse available projects
OnboardingPage.step.browseProjects.descr: Explore projects that match your skills and interests.
OnboardingPage.step.firstApplication.des: Take the leap and submit your first application!
OnboardingPage.step.createProject.title: Create your first project
OnboardingPage.step.createProject.descri: Post a project to start attracting talented students.
OnboardingPage.step.findStudents.title: Discover student talent
OnboardingPage.step.findStudents.descrip: Search for students with the skills you need.
OnboardingPage.step.viewDashboard.title: View your dashboard
OnboardingPage.step.viewDashboard.descri: Monitor your institution's student engagement and project participation.
